= Introduction =
We will introduce how use the `JBusyComponent` as a JavaBean in the palette manager.
And layout and configure the `JBusyComponent` with Matisse

= Creating a Netbeans' library ==
 * Menu *Tools / Libraries*
   * Button *New libraries...*
     * Library name : *JBusyComponent*
     * Library type : *Class library*
     * Button *Ok*
   * Tab *ClassPath*
     * Button *Add Jar/Folder*
       * Select the *jbusycomponent-1.0.2.jar*
   * Tab *Sources*
     * Button *Add Jar/Folder*
       * Select the *jbusycomponent-1.0.2-sources.jar*
   * Tab *Javadoc*
     * Button *Add Zip/Folder*
       * Select the *jbusycomponent-1.0.2-javadoc.jar*
   * Button *Ok*
